name: I just want to know you better
name_original: I just want to know you better
description:
"I just want to know you better" is a fun experience designed to know more about a stranger, a friend or a couple. A simple experiment where you get asked a question and you answer! As simple as this.

Warning: Do not play this on PC. Altought it is completely possible, the game was designed with touchscreens in mind, and preferably a phone. You may open this link on the mobile web, or download the app!
